PRODUCTS_CATALOGUE_PAGE.TITLE: Product Catalogue
PRODUCTS_CATALOGUE_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This is where product information is being managed. User can choose items and add them to cart.

TRANSACTION_HISTORY_PAGE.TITLE: Transactions
TRANSACTION_HISTORY_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This shows the list of dates where there are transactions recorded.

DRAFT_TRANSACTIONS_PAGE.TITLE: Draft Transactions
DRAFT_TRANSACTIONS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This shows available dates that have draft transactions.

TRANSACTION_PAGE.TITLE: Transactions
TRANSACTION_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This shows the list of customers that have transactions for the selected date.

MARK_TRANSACTION_AS_PAID_DIALOG.TITLE: Mark as Paid
MARK_TRANSACTION_AS_PAID_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to mark this transaction as paid?
MARK_TRANSACTION_AS_PAID_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Selected transaction is now marked as paid.
MARK_TRANSACTION_AS_PAID_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Marking the transaction as paid failed. Please try again later.

TOP_PRODUCTS_PAGE.TITLE: Top Products
TOP_PRODUCTS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This shows statistics of the most frequently transacted products.

SALES_PAGE.TITLE: Sales
SALES_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This shows the amount of sales that the system recorded based on the date filter.

TEXT_ORDER_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Set orders by pasting texts following the format below:

REPORTS_PAGE.TITLE: Reports
REPORTS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This page contains the list of different type of reports that user can use for data analysis.

REPORTS_INFORMATION.DAILY_SUMMARIZE_TRANSACTIONS_REPORT_DESC: This report can generate a summary of confirmed transactions on a given date. This helps user to analyze and gives an insight of their daily transactions.
REPORTS_INFORMATION.DAILY_DETAILED_TRANSACTIONS_REPORT_DESC: This report can generate detailed transactions on a given date. This presents transactions in an itemized manner where user can analyze purchased item per transactions. Take note that it only extract details from confirmed transactions.
REPORTS_INFORMATION.ENDING_INVENTORY_PER_PRODUCT_REPORT_DESC: The user can see the beginning and ending stocks information for a given date using this report. This will help administrators to analyze how much was the initial stocks loaded and how much was left.

GENERATE_REPORT_DIALOG.TITLE: Generate Report
GENERATE_REPORT_DIALOG.CONFIRM: This will generate report in an excel file format and will be sent to your email address. Do you want to  proceeed?
GENERATE_REPORT_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Report has been successfully generated. The report will be sent to your email. Please check your email. Thank you!
GENERATE_REPORT_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to generate report file. Please try again later.

PROFILE_PAGE.TITLE: Profile
PROFILE_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This is where user profile information can be managed.

EMAIL_CONTROL.INVALID_EMAIL_ERROR_MESSAGE: Invalid email format. Please enter a valid email address.

USERNAME_CONTROL.ALREADY_EXIST_ERROR_MESSAGE: Username already exists. Please enter a different username

NEW_PASSWORD_CONTROL.LABEL: New Password
NEW_PASSWORD_CONTROL.PASSWORD_NOT_STRONG_ERROR_MESSAGE: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include one letter, one digit, and one special character.
